article_title: You Won't Believe How the Apple Watch Can Cut Your Insurance Bill
article_text: 20 Cars That Are Way Better --and Cheaper -- Than the Tesla Model X

article_metadata.description: Wearable technology from companies like Apple (AAPL) will fundamentally change insurance, potentially giving a price break to users whose good habits make them healthier and likely to live longer.
article_metadata.author: Simon Constable
